name: sxo4857q
description:
This game is a work-in-progress, and there's no guarantee I'll ever finish it, but as of right now it's somewhat playable and has cool features like;

  • Races
  • Time Trials
  • 6 Ship models
  • 4 tracks
  • really slick menus
  • 1 Player Events
  • 2-6 person local multiplayer*
  • Seriously though, the menus are slick

It's pretty rough in some places and there are definitely features missing right now, so I've set the price a little lower to reflect that. Don't expect to buy this now and be getting a finished game before sometime next year! ;)

*1 person can play with a keyboard, for more players you'll need gamepads
